name: Design Research Integration
description: Validates that CSS selectors bind to TSX classNames with ≥95% coverage and no convention mismatches

validations.description: Both implementation and design research files must exist

notes: G5.2 is a structural integration gate. The Design Research Integration Agent checks that CSS custom properties defined in DESIGN-RESEARCH.md are used in the CSS file, and that className values in TSX have corresponding CSS selectors. Automated coverage checking (≥95%) is beyond the current validator's capability, so this gate relies on the agent's report. The runner validates file existence as a prerequisite.
